infos.value: Is that...!?
Are you all right!?
Nngh...
Thank goodness. It seems you are unscathed.
Is this...the east?
We here consider it quite central.
But it is true that those from the mainland call this "the east."
I see... I made it after all.
And in one piece, nonetheless. My name is Miranda. And you are...?
I am Raviesse.
And what has brought you all this way, Raviesse?
There is only one reason people venture to the east.
In that case, I suggest you go back.
But why?
There are countless people who come here chasing that dream.
But they are met with naught but despair.
This is no place for those who lack skill.
But I am not like them.
Of course not... Everyone who comes here says so at first.
Do not waste your breath trying to dissuade me.
If you are so determined, then you had best come with me.
I shall introduce you to my masters.
Truly?
Though I fear you will regret it.
